Entries.Emily: Hi!^How are you doing? I hope you enjoy the gift I've sent you... Well, goodbye! +   ^   -Emmett %item object 397 1 428 1 440 1 %%[#]A Gift From Emmett
Entries.EmilyCooking: @!^Flip this letter over for instructions on how to make a super-healthy meal!^You'll feel energized. See you soon. ^   -Emmett%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Emmett's Healthy Recipe
Entries.EmilyClothingTherapy: @,^I have this crazy new idea that I want to involve you in... It's called "Clothing Therapy".^^Please come to the Mayor's house today to see what it's all about.^^ Love, Emmett[#]Emmett's Idea
Entries.EmilyCamping: @,^Let's go camping! ^^ Meet me in the secret woods after 10pm.^^ Love, Emmett[#]Emmett's Invitation
Entries.EmilyDoneCamping: Thanks for joining me last night... I had a great time.^I'm actually glad that bear showed up!^^See you soon^^  Love, Emmett[#]Emmett's Note
Entries.winter_6_1: I've got an unusual request. Could you keep this a secret?^ I want you to deliver an amethyst to Emmett. It's his favorite stone. Tell him it's from me.^   -Clint %item quest 110 %%[#]Clint's Unusual Request
Entries.spring_6_2: @-^I'm really craving a fresh apricot. I haven't been able to find one at the store, so I'm asking you. I'll pay you well for it!^   -Emmett%item quest 115 %%[#]Emmett's Request
